item.title: Adding monsters with hp?
item.dc:creator: @range_king range king
item.description:
@range_king wrote:

first you need to actually give the npc the health you want, so you go into npc.cfg it should come up with something like this:

//----NpcID-----NpcName-------------------------combat--health npc = 0 Hans 0 0 npc = 1 Man 2 7 npc = 2 Man 2 7 npc = 3 Man 2 7 npc = 4 Woman 2 0 npc = 5 Woman 2 0 npc = 6 Woman 2 0 npc = 7 Farmer 7 12 npc = 8 Thief 16 17 npc = 9 Guard 21 22 npc = 10 Guard 22 20 npc = 11 Tramp 2 12 npc = 12 Barbarian 7 0 npc = 13 Wizard 9 12 npc = 14 Druid 33 30 npc = 15 Warrior_woman 24 15 npc = 16 Man 2 7 npc = 17 Barbarian_woman 8 15 npc = 18 Al-Kharid_warrior 9 0 npc = 19 White_Knight 36 60 npc = 20 Paladin 62 80 npc = 21 Hero 69 60 npc = 22 Forester 15 0 npc = 23 Knight_of_Ardougne 46 0 npc = 24 Man 2 4

DO NOT change the combat but change the health to whatever you think is best

adding npc,

to add a npc you have to go into autospawn.cfg

first you got to look for a folder on your moperscape called all id’s, take the monster one and open it, look for a monster you want

now

log onto your own server and type ::coordson -should always work, look for a place where you want your monster to spawn and note down the coords

now click back into your autospawn.cfg and you shold seee this

//------NpcID---CoordX--CoordY--Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption spawn = 494 3256 3418 0 0 0 0 0 1 Varrock East Bank Male Banker spawn = 494 3254 3418 0 0 0 0 0 1 Varrock East Bank Male Banker spawn = 494 3253 3418 0 0 0 0 0 1 Varrock East Bank Male Banker spawn = 495 3252 3418 0 0 0 0 0 1 Varrock East Bank Female Banker spawn = 495 3254 3417 0 0 0 0 0 1 Varrock East Bank Female Banker spawn = 494 3187 3436 0 0 0 0 0 1 Varrock West Bank Male Banker spawn = 495 3187 3438 0 0 0 0 0 1 Varrock West Bank Female Banker spawn = 494 3187 3440 0 0 0 0 0 1 Varrock West Bank Male Banker spawn = 494 3187 3442 0 0 0 0 0 1 Varrock West Bank Male Banker spawn = 494 3187 3444 0 0 0 0 0 1 Varrock West Bank Male Banker spawn = 495 3187 3446 0 0 0 0 0 1 Varrock West Bank Female Banker spawn = 494 2945 3366 0 0 0 0 0 1 Falador West Bank Male Banker spawn = 494 2946 3366 0 0 0 0 0 1 Falador West Bank Male Banker spawn = 495 2947 3366 0 0 0 0 0 1 Falador West Bank Female Banker spawn = 494 2948 3366 0 0 0 0 0 1

add this at the bottom,

spawn = 0452 yyyyy xxxx 0 0 0 0 0 1 Falador West Bank Female

the first bit is where you put your monster id the yyyy’s and the xxxx’s are your coords, change the decription at the end to the one on your id list.

that should get you your first hp filled npc

Read full topic
